info.name: Hospital Mangement API
info.description:
The Hospital_Management_API.json file is a Postman collection that encapsulates all API requests for our Hospital Management System backend. It includes 42 endpoints defined in our route.js file, covering functionalities like patient management, bed assignments, staff scheduling, billing, and more. This file demonstrates that each endpoint has been tested successfully against our Node.js server connected to the Hospital_Management SQL Server database, fulfilling the requirements of Deliverable 3.

#### Purpose

- **Testing**: Verifies that all CRUD operations and reports (e.g., patient registration, bed occupancy, monthly revenue) work as intended.
    
- **Documentation**: Provides a structured, executable representation of our API for review by our instructor.
    
- **Submission**: Serves as a deliverable alongside our backend code (server.js, route.js, controller.js, model.js, etc.), proving functionality without a frontend.
